src_original: subhūtirāha - yathā svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā uktā bhagavatā,
tathā na tasya karmaṇo bhavatyācayo vā upacayo vā /
atha punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati, (Vaidya 177)  bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā /
ityevaṃ vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati /  śāriputra āha - sacedāyuṣman subhūte sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati - aho hataḥ,
